dbQuery.query: WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ACTIVITY_ZONE_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ACTIVITY_ZONE_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.ACTIVITY_ZONE_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ELBOW_SPECIFICATION_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ELBOW_SPECIFICATION_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.ELBOW_SPECIFICATION_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ANOMALY_EXTENSION_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ANOMALY_EXTENSION_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.ANOMALY_EXTENSION_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCRIPTION

SELECT i.ili_inspection_id AS CODE , CASE WHEN l.line_id =0 THEN 'Отчет не привязан и не рассчитан.' ELSE rt.DESCRIPTION END ||' ' ||CASE WHEN l.line_id = 0 THEN ir.DESCRIPTION ELSE l.DESCRIPTION END ||' ('||s.station_begin||' - ' ||s.station_end||'), ' || to_char(i.begin_date,'DD.MM.YY') ||', ' ||iv.description DESCR FROM pods.ili_inspection i JOIN pods.ili_inspection_range ir ON i.ili_inspection_id = ir.ili_inspection_id JOIN pods.ili_tool_vendor_cl iv ON i.tool_vendor_cl = iv.code JOIN pods.event_range e ON ir.event_id = e.event_id JOIN pods.station_point spb ON e.station_id_begin = spb.station_id JOIN pods.series s ON s.series_id = spb.series_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN pods.route_type_cl rt ON r.type_cl = rt.code JOIN pods.line l ON l.line_id = r.line_id WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.station_point sp JOIN pods.location lc ON sp.location_id = lc.location_id WHERE sp.series_id = s.series_id AND CASE WHEN lc.srv_district_gcl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE lc.srv_district_gcl END IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER}) AND ((0 IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) OR ((0 NOT IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) AND (l.line_id != 0))) AND i.ili_inspection_id in ({ILI_INSP_FILTER}) AND l.line_id IN ({LINE_ID})) ORDER BY RT.DESCRIPTION,l.description,s.station_begin,s.station_end

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ILI_TOOL_VENDOR_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_ILI_TOOL_VENDOR_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.ILI_TOOL_VENDOR_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_SENSOR_GCL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_SENSOR_GCL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1)))
SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, TYPE_CL, MANUFACTURER_SCL, MODEL_NUMBER_SCL, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.SENSOR_GCL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

SELECT EVENT_ID CODE ,NAME DESCR ,NAME ,DESCRIPTION ,TYPE_CL ,WORKSHOP_NEAR_TRAP_LF ,ELECTRICITY_AVAILABLE_LF ,HOIST_AVAILABLE_LF ,TRAP_PRESSURE_RATING ,TRAP_HEIGHT ,TRAP_CLOSURE_TYPE_CL ,TRAP_STATUS_CL ,TRAP_VALVE_TYPE_GCL ,KICKER_BYPASS_LOCATION_CL ,BRIDLE_DIAMETER_GCL ,TRAP_VALVE_DIAMETER_GCL ,KICKER_BYPASS_DIAMETER_GCL ,OVERBORE_DIAMETER_GCL ,REDUCER_WALL_THICKNESS_GCL ,DATE_INSTALLED ,CLOSURE_REDUCER_LENGTH ,TRAY_LENGTH ,CLOSURE_BRIDLE_LENGTH ,CLOSURE_VALVE_LENGTH ,AXIAL_CLEARANCE_WIDTH ,AXIAL_CLEARANCE_LENGTH ,TRAP_ANGLE ,REDUCER_TYPE_GCL ,SAG_RADIUS ,OVERBEND_RADIUS ,REDUCER_VALVE_LENGTH ,REDUCER_LENGTH ,SOURCE_GCL ,COMMENTS ,EVENT_ID FROM PODS.LAUNCHER_RECEIVER WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_WORK_ORDER')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_WORK_ORDER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1)))
SELECT AFE, COMMENTS, COMPANY_GCL, DESCRIPTION, ENDING_DATE, ORDERED_DATE, PLANNED_END_DATE, PLANNED_START_DATE, SOURCE_GCL, STARTING_DATE, TYPE_CL, VENDOR_COMPANY_GCL, VENDOR_WORK_NUMBER, WORK_ORDER_ID AS CODE, WORK_ORDER_NUMBER, (WORK_ORDER_NUMBER|| ', '||DESCRIPTION) AS DESCR FROM PODS.WORK_ORDER WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_PIPE_SEGMENT_MATERIAL_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_PIPE_SEGMENT_MATERIAL_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.PIPE_SEGMENT_MATERIAL_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_NEAREST_FACILITY_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_NEAREST_FACILITY_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.NEAREST_FACILITY_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50. B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p. POLICY_ID = pr. POLICY_ID WHERE r2p. role_id = u2r. role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_PHYSICAL_INSPECTION' )) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_PHYSICAL_INSPECTION' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) (SELECT i.event_id CODE ,i.description DESCR FROM pods.physical_inspection i WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants ) AND i.event_id = -90 UNION ALL SELECT I.EVENT_ID AS CODE, CASE i.event_id WHEN -90 THEN i.description ELSE RT.DESCRIPTION || ' ' || L.DESCRIPTION || ' ' || S.STATION_BEGIN || '-' || S.STATION_END || ' км. ' || CAST (I.INSPECTION_START_DATE AS VARCHAR (20)) || ' ' || C.DESCRIPTION END DESCR FROM pods.physical_inspection i JOIN pods.inspection_type_gcl c ON c.code = i.inspection_type_gcl JOIN pods.event_range er ON er.event_id = i.event_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.station_id = er.station_id_begin JOIN pods.series s ON s.series_id = sp.series_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN pods.route_type_cl rt ON rt.code = r.type_cl JOIN pods.line l ON r.line_id = l.line_id WHERE i.event_id != -90 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants ) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pods.event_range e JOIN pods.station_point sp1 ON sp1.station_id = e.station_id_begin JOIN pods.station_point sp2 ON sp2.station_id = e.station_id_end JOIN pods.route r1 ON r1.route_id = sp1.route_id AND r1.line_id != 0 JOIN pods.route r2 ON r2.route_id = sp2.route_id AND r2.line_id = r1.line_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id IN (r1.route_id , r2.route_id ) OR (r.line_id = r1.line_id AND r.sequence > r1.sequence AND r2.sequence > r.sequence) JOIN pods.series s ON s.route_id = r.route_id JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.series_id = s.series_id AND sp.type_cl IN ('ST_POINT_TYPE_01', 'ST_POINT_TYPE_02','ST_POINT_TYPE_03' ) AND (r.route_id !=r1.route_id OR sp.measure >= sp1.measure ) AND (r.route_id !=r2.route_id OR sp.measure <= sp2.measure ) JOIN PODS.LOCATION l ON sp.LOCATION_ID = l.LOCATION_ID WHERE e.event_id = er.event_id AND CASE WHEN l.srv_district_gcl IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE l.srv_district_gcl END IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER})) AND coalesce(r.line_id, 0) IN ({LINE_ID}) ) ORDER BY DESCR

SELECT d.event_id CODE ,lt.description || ' ' || ln.description || ' ' || CAST(ROUND(min(sp.station)) AS VARCHAR(20)) || '-' || CAST(ROUND(max(sp.station)) AS VARCHAR(20)) || ' км. ' || ' ' || substr(d.description,NULLIF(strpos(d.description,'полугодие'),0)-2) DESCR FROM PODS.PI_CP_INSPECTION d JOIN PODS.EVENT_RANGE e ON e.EVENT_ID = d.EVENT_ID AND e.CURRENT_INDICATOR_LF = 'Y' JOIN pods.STATION_POINT sp1 ON sp1.STATION_ID = e.STATION_ID_BEGIN JOIN pods.STATION_POINT sp2 ON sp2.STATION_ID = e.STATION_ID_END JOIN pods.route r1 ON r1.route_id = sp1.route_id AND r1.line_id != 0 JOIN pods.route r2 ON r2.route_id = sp2.route_id AND r2.line_id = r1.line_id JOIN pods.route r ON r.route_id IN (r1.route_id, r2.route_id) OR (r.line_id = r1.line_id AND r.sequence > r1.sequence AND r2.sequence > r.sequence) JOIN pods.line ln ON ln.line_id = r.line_id AND ln.type_cl = CASE r.type_cl WHEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_10' THEN 'LINE_TYPE_01' WHEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_11' THEN 'LINE_TYPE_02' WHEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_12' THEN 'LINE_TYPE_03' WHEN 'ROUTE_TYPE_04' THEN 'LINE_TYPE_04' END JOIN pods.line_type_cl lt ON lt.code = ln.type_cl JOIN pods.station_point sp ON sp.route_id = r.route_id AND sp.type_cl IN ('ST_POINT_TYPE_01','ST_POINT_TYPE_02','ST_POINT_TYPE_03') AND (r.route_id!=r1.route_id OR sp.measure >= sp1.measure) AND (r.route_id!=r2.route_id OR sp.measure <= sp2.measure) JOIN pods.location l ON l.location_id = sp.location_id WHERE coalesce(ln.line_id, 0) in ({LINE_ID}) AND CASE WHEN L.SRV_DISTRICT_GCL IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE L.SRV_DISTRICT_GCL END IN ({LPU_ACCESS_FILTER}) GROUP BY d.event_id ,lt.description,d.description , ln.description ORDER BY DESCR,CODE

WITH select_grants AS (SELECT 1 x FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_DATA' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_COATING_CONDITION_CL')) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE r2p.role_id = u2r.role_id AND pr.CLASS_ID = 'PODS_COATING_CONDITION_CL' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = 1))) SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM PODS.COATING_CONDITION_CL WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM select_grants) ORDER BY DESCR

SELECT line_id CODE ,ln.description DESCR ,lt.description TYPE_CL ,ln.designator ,ln.product_type_scl ,ln.product_subtype_scl ,ln.operating_status_gcl ,ln.system_type_cl ,ln.interstate_lf FROM PODS.LINE ln JOIN pods.line_type_cl lt ON lt.code = ln.type_cl WHERE ln.DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lt.code,LOWER(ln.DESCRIPTION)
